System Reasons for Not Performing Flow Cytometry

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt
    Code Display
    3170F Flow cytometry studies performed at time of diagnosis or prior to initiating treatment (HEM)
    3P Performance Measure Exclusion Modifier due to System Reasons

name: System Reasons for Not Performing Flow Cytometry
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward
